title: 3dUpsample
description: Upsamples a 3D+time dataset in the time direction by a specified factor.

upsample_factor.title: Upsample Factor
upsample_factor.description: Upsampling factor; must be between 2 and 320 (inclusive)

linear_interpolation.title: Linear Interpolation Flag
linear_interpolation.description: Use linear interpolation instead of 7th order polynomial interpolation

output_prefix.title: Output Prefix
output_prefix.description: Define the prefix name of the output dataset; default is 'Upsam'

datatype.title: Output Datatype
datatype.description: Specify the datatype for the output dataset (float, short, byte); default is float
